info.title: OPERA Cloud Sales Event Management API
info.description:
APIs to cater for Event Management functionality in OPERA Cloud.

The Events feature in OPERA Cloud is designed to manage any kind of catering activity. Events can be as simple as a one-hour reception or more complex, such as a three-day business meeting with meals, breaks, and specific meeting functionSpaceDetails with setupCode and resource requirements. Any group function can be an Event.

Compatible with OPERA Cloud release 21.5.0.0.

This document and all content within is available under the Universal Permissive License v 1.0 (https://oss.oracle.com/licenses/upl). Copyright (c) 2020, 2022 Oracle and/or its affiliates.

get.description:
Use this API to retrieve multiple Events for a specific hotel, you can narrow the results using different search criteria such as event eventStartDate and eventEndDate dates, and block name.

OperationId:getEventsMultipleHotels

parameters.name: hotelIds
parameters.description: This is the Hotel Code of the Event

parameters.name: eventStartDate
parameters.description: The starting value of the date range.

parameters.name: eventEndDate
parameters.description: The ending value of the date range.

parameters.name: blockId
parameters.description: Block ID linked to the Catering Event

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: Unique ID for the catering event

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Simple type for block instructions to be used in requests for fetching blocks. Valid status values are Group, Source, TravelAgent, Contact, Company.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Attached profile name

parameters.name: attachedProfileId
parameters.description: A unique identifying numeric value assigned to a profile utilized to fetch events associated to blocks linked to the profile.

parameters.name: eventStatusCodes
parameters.description: Status Codes associated with the events to be fetched.

parameters.name: eventTypeCodes
parameters.description: Event Type Codes associated with the events to be fetched.

parameters.name: includeInactive
parameters.description: Indicates whether to include inactive events in search result.

parameters.name: includeAlternateEvents
parameters.description: Indicates whether to include the alternate events in the search result.

parameters.name: includeSubEvents
parameters.description: Indicates whether to include the sub events in the search result.

parameters.name: cateringEventOrderBy
parameters.description: A collection of supported list of order by for search catering events.

parameters.name: fetchInstructions
parameters.description: Instructions to fetch details information about the selected event. The BlocksInfo fetch instructions will retain a limited amount of data for the associated block.  The Indicators instruction will provide a count.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

get.description:
Use this API to retrieve multiple Events for a specific hotel, you can narrow the results using different search criteria such as event eventStartDate and eventEndDate dates, and block name.

OperationId:getEventsOneHotel

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of a hotel

parameters.name: eventStartDate
parameters.description: The starting value of the date range.

parameters.name: eventEndDate

parameters.name: blockId
parameters.description: Block ID linked to the Catering Event

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: Unique ID for the catering event

parameters.name: attachedProfileId
parameters.description: A unique identifying numeric value assigned to a profile utilized to fetch events associated to blocks linked to the profile.

parameters.name: eventStatusCodes
parameters.description: Status Codes associated with the events to be fetched.

parameters.name: eventTypeCodes
parameters.description: Event Type Codes associated with the events to be fetched.

parameters.name: includeInactive
parameters.description: Indicates whether to include inactive events in search result.

parameters.name: includeAlternateEvents
parameters.description: Indicates whether to include the alternate events in the search result.

parameters.name: includeSubEvents
parameters.description: Indicates whether to include the sub events in the search result.

parameters.name: cateringEventOrderBy
parameters.description: A collection of supported list of order by for search catering events.

parameters.name: fetchInstructions
parameters.description: Instruction to fetch all eligible master events for the selected event

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

get.description:
This API will allow you to retrieve an event by specifying the event ID in the path.  Event details will be returned.  You can also add fetch instructions to specify what event data you would like returned in the response.  If you don't know the eventID, please use getEvents API to find the event and it's respective eventID.

OperationId:getEvent

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the event

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of a hotel

parameters.name: fetchInstructions
parameters.description: Instruction to fetch all eligible master events for the selected event

authKey.name: authorization
authKey.description: Bearer token that needs to be passed which is generated post user authentication

x-hotelid.name: x-hotelid
x-hotelid.description: Mandatory parameter to identify the hotel code where the eventEndDate user is logged in

masterInfoList.description: Refer to Generic common types document

eventSummary.description: Contains master/sub-events or standalone events summary information

totalPages.description: Evaluated total page count based on the requested max fetch count.

offset.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

limit.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

blockIdList.description: Unique ID to represent the block that the event belongs to.

functionSpaceDetails.description: The function space functionSpaceDetails where the event takes place.

rentalAmount.description: Rental amount for the event function space.

functionSpaceSetup.description: Setup Style selected for the Function Space.

eventStatus.description: Status of the event. Examples are INQ, TEN, DEF, etc.

waitlistReturnStatus.description: This is to show the turned status of an event

cateringStatusType.description: Event Status Type Flag to identify if the Catering event is cancelled, lost, actual, etc. Examples are C(Cancelled), L (Lost), R (Refused), A (Actual).

cateringStatusDeductInventory.description: Flag to indicate if the Catering event deducts resources from inventory.

cateringStatusReturnToInventory.description: Flag to indicate if the Catering event returns resources to inventory.

setupTime.description: Event space setupCode time in minutes.

tearDownTime.description: Event space tear down time in minutes.

masterEvent.description: Flag to indicate if the event is a master event.

subEvent.description: Flag to indicate if the event is a sub event.

packageEvent.description: Flag to indicate if the event is part of a package.

alternateEvent.description: Flag to indicate if the event is booked as a backup for another event.

displayDoorCard.description: Flag to indicate if the doorcard has been selected to display on reports or external readerboard systems.

doorCard.description: The doorcard to be displayed on reports or external readerboard systems.

excludeFromForecast.description: Flag to indicate if the event revenue should be excluded from the forecast.

useForecastRevenue.description: Flag to indicate whether to only use the forecasted values when reporting, regardless of whether resources are booked on an event.

minimumOccupancy.description: Minimum Occupancy for the SetupCode of Catring Event.

maximumOccupancy.description: Maximum Occupancy for the SetupCode of Catring Event.

discountPercentage.description: Discount Percentage applied to Rent Amount.

loudEvent.description: Indicates whether the event is expected to be noisy and might possibly disturb other events.

eventShared.description: Flag to indicate if the event is shareable with other events.

shareable.description: Flag to indicate if the event functionSpaceDetails is shareable.

packageCode.description: Package Code of the Event if it has a Package Enabled in it.

hotelId.description: Hotel where the event is booked.

blockHotelCode.description: Hotel where the Block is created for the event.

hasPostings.description: Indicates whether the event has postings.

blockHasPostings.description: Indicates whether any event in the block has postings.

hasPartialPostings.description: Indicates whether the event has posted some charges, but not all.

allPosted.description: Indicates whether the event has posted all charges.

nothingPosted.description: Indicates that none of the charges on the event have been posted.

eventStartDate.description: The starting value of the time span.

eventEndDate.description: The ending value of the time span.

type.description: Type of event. Examples are LUN, DIN, etc.

eventName.description: Name of event. This is used to describe the event.

cateringCurrency.description: Currency code when base currency of the property is different than the catering currency.

cateringQuotedCurrency.description: Currency code which is been quoted for Catering Events

eventIndicators.description: Indicators of additional information attached to the event

eventId.description: An identifier used to uniquely reference an object in a system (e.g. an airline reservation reference, customer profile reference, booking confirmation number, or a reference to a previous availability quote).

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID elementSpace.

idContext.description: Used to identify the source of the identifier (e.g., IATA, ABTA).

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

uniqueID_Type.description: An identifier used to uniquely reference an object in a system (e.g. an airline reservation reference, customer profile reference, booking confirmation number, or a reference to a previous availability quote).

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID elementSpace.

cateringEventLinkTypeType.description: A collection of supported list of link types for catering events.

dateTimeSpanType.description: Allows for a choice in description of the amount of time spanned by this type. EndDate specifies a specific date, while Duration provides a measure of time to add to the StartDate to yield eventEndDate date.

blockIdList.description: Unique Id that references an object uniquely in the system.

codeDescriptionType.description: This contains a generic code and description information.

count.description: Indicates number of occurrences of the indicator.

bookingStatusType.description: Booking status code, description and configured color of the status. This will be used for block and event statuses.

cateringStatusTypeType.description: List of Event Status Types to identify the current status of catering events.

addtionalCodeInfoType.description: Holds name of additional code information

name.description: Holds name of additional code information

value.description: Holds value of additional code information

instanceLink.description: Metadata describing link description objects that MAY appear in the JSON instance representation.

href.description: URI [RFC3986] or URI Template [RFC6570]. If the value is set to URI Template, then the "templated" property must be set to true.

rel.description: Name of the link relation that, in addition to the type property, can be used to retrieve link details. For example, href or profile.

templated.description: Boolean flag that specifies that "href" property is a URI or URI Template. If the property is a URI template, set this value to true. By default, this value is false.

method.description: HTTP method for requesting the target of the link.

targetSchema.description: Link to the metadata of the resource, such as JSON-schema, that describes the resource expected when dereferencing the target resource..

operationId.description: The operationId of the path you can call to follow this link.  This allows you to look up not only the path and method, but the description of that path and any parameters you need to supply.

title.description: Exact copy of the "summary" field on the linked operation.

warningsType.description: Used in conjunction with the Success elementSpace to define a business error.

warningType.description: Used when a message has been successfully processed to report any warnings or business errors that occurred.

shortText.description: An abbreviated version of the error in textual format.

code.description: If present, this refers to a table of coded values exchanged between applications to identify errors or warnings.

docURL.description: If present, this URL refers to an online description of the error that occurred.

status.description: If present, recommended values are those enumerated in the ErrorRS, (NotProcessed Incomplete Complete Unknown) however, the data type is designated as string data, recognizing that trading partners may identify additional status conditions not included in the enumeration.

tag.description: If present, this attribute may identify an unknown or misspelled tag that caused an error in processing. It is recommended that the Tag attribute use XPath notation to identify the location of a tag in the event that more than one tag of the same name is present in the document. Alternatively, the tag name alone can be used to identify missing data [Type=ReqFieldMissing].

recordId.description: If present, this attribute allows for batch processing and the identification of the record that failed amongst a group of records. This value may contain a concatenation of a unique failed transaction ID with specific record(s) associated with that transaction.

type.description: The Warning elementSpace MUST contain the Type attribute that uses a recommended set of values to indicate the warning type. The validating XSD can expect to accept values that it has NOT been explicitly coded for and process them by using Type ="Unknown".

rph.description: Reference Place Holder used as an index for this warning.

exceptionDetailType.title: Error Detail
exceptionDetailType.description: Complex type that contains error details for a REST call.

type.description: Absolute URI [RFC3986] that identifies the problem type.  When dereferenced, it SHOULD provide a human-readable summary of the problem (for example, using HTML).

title.description: Short, human-readable summary of the problem.  The summary SHOULD NOT change for subsequent occurrences of the problem, except for purposes of localization.

status.description: HTTP status code for this occurrence of the problem, set by the origin server.

detail.description: Human-readable description specific to this occurrence of the problem.

o:errorCode.description: Application error code, which is different from HTTP error code.

o:errorPath.description: Path to the problem at the resource or property level.

o:errorDetails.description: Details of the error message, consisting of a hierarchical tree structure.

errorInstance.title: Error Instance Details
errorInstance.description: Complex type that contains error instance details for a REST call.

type.description: Absolute URI [RFC3986] that identifies the problem type.  When dereferenced, it SHOULD provide a human-readable summary of the problem (for example, using HTML).

title.description: Short, human-readable summary of the problem.  The summary SHOULD NOT change for subsequent occurrences of the problem, except for purposes of localization.

status.description: HTTP status code for this occurrence of the problem, set by the origin server.

detail.description: Human-readable description specific to this occurrence of the problem.

o:errorCode.description: Application error code, which is different from HTTP error code.

o:errorPath.description: Path to the problem at the resource or property level.

event.description: Object containing details of the event.

processInstructions.description: Instructions to control how the event is created.

eventBlockInfo.description: Pertain information for block where event belongs to.

eventIndicators.description: Indicators of additional information attached to the event

onTheBooksRevenue.description: On The Books (OTB) catering revenue for the event.

subEventsDetail.description: Pertain detail information of sub event/events.

altEventsDetail.description: Pertain detail information of alternate event/events in case functionspace for current event becomes unavailable

masterEventDetail.description: Pertain detail information of master event.

hotelId.description: Hotel code where event will be organized.

includeSubEvents.description: Indicates whether to delete/inactive the sub event(s) of the master event.

eventDetailType.description: Pertain Information about the Event Details

eventTimeSpan.description: Pertain event duration from eventStartDate and eventEndDate date and time.

waitlistReturnStatus.description: This is to show the turned status of an event

cateringStatusType.description: Event Status Type Flag to identify if the Catering event is cancelled or lost. Examples are C(Cancelled), L (Lost), R (Refused).

attendees.description: Attendees defined in the catering event.

doorcard.description: It is the group details to display on the outside of a meeting functionSpaceDetails.

masterEvent.description: Indicates whether event is master event.

subEvent.description: Flag to indicate if the event is a sub event.

packageEvent.description: Flag to indicate if the event is part of a package.

alternateEvent.description: Flag to indicate if the event is booked as a backup for another event.

waitlisted.description: Indicates whether event is wait listed.

notMoveable.description: Indicates whether event dates and functionSpaceDetails are move able.

loudEvent.description: Indicates whether the event is expected to be noisy and might possibly disturb other events.

hasPostings.description: Indicates whether the events has postings.

displayDoorcard.description: Indicates whether display the doorcard information on the Event Overview report.

cateringDeductInventory.description: Indicates if catering event's spaces are deducted from inventory

eventShared.description: Flag to indicate if the event is shareable with other events.

creatorId.description: ID of creator. The creator could be a software system identifier or an identifier of an employee resposible for the creation.

lastModifierId.description: Identifies the last software system or person to modify a record.

purgeDate.description: Date an item will be purged from a database (e.g., from a live database to an archive).

includeSpaceInPackage.description: Flag to indicate if the event space is associated from the Package

eventLevelRevenueActualization.description: Flag that indicates if actual revenue can be manually edited.

translationTextType60.description: Contains Multiple translated texts and language codes.

defaultText.description: Default text with Character length from 0 to 60.

translations.description: List of translated text and language codes.

value.description: Used for Character Strings, length 0 to 2000.

cateringEventsAttendeesType.description: All different attendees that a catering event can have.

expected.description: Number of expected attendees for the catering event.

guaranteed.description: Number of guaranteed attendees for the catering event.

actual.description: Number of actual attendees attending to the catering event.

set.description: Setup for number of event attendees for resources (i.e. water, pads, tables, etc.).

billed.description: This defines the count of billed attendees with respect to the menu.

packageExpected.description: Number of package expected attendees for the catering event.

packageGuaranteed.description: Number of package guaranteed attendees for the catering event.

packageActual.description: Number of actual package attendees attending the catering event.

packageBilled.description: This defines the count of package billed attendees with respect to the menu.

resourceId.description: Unique identifier for an event resource.

resourceName.description: Resource name, this could be a resource item or a menu.

setupCode.description: Setup style for the function space.

itemAttribute.description: Item attribute name for non Food and Beverage item.

quantity.description: The required quantity of the resource.

hours.description: The number of charged hours for the resource.

persons.description: The number of charged persons for the resource.

quantityIncluded.description: The attendees/quantity of an item INCLUDED in a package price.

quantityExcluded.description: The attendees/quantity charged extra, EXCLUDED from the package price.

unitPrice.description: Price per unit of the resource.

rentalCode.description: Rate Code that is attached to the function spaces and non Food and Beverage items

eventResourceNotes.description: Pertains to the event resource's notes.

sellStartDate.description: Sell Start Date of resource of type Menu.

sellEndDate.description: Sell End Date of resource of type Menu.

eventStartDate.description: Event Start Date of resource of type Menu.

eventEndDate.description: Event End Date of resource of type Menu.

consumptionBased.description: Indicates that this resource is consumption based in a catering package

multiChoice.description: Indicates that this resource is a MultiChoice Menu or not

hotelId.description: Hotel code which the event resource belong to.

order.description: The order of the resource in the Banquet Event Order within their specific resource group.

hasDiscountMenuItem.description: Flag that indicates if at least one menu item has a discount.

hasNotes.description: Flag that indicates the resource has notes associated with it.

external.description: Indicates that item must be ordered externally.

custom.description: Indicates that this resource item is a custom item added for this event.

packaged.description: Indicates that this resource is included in a catering package.

resourceId.description: An identifier used to uniquely reference an object in a system (e.g. an airline reservation reference, customer profile reference, booking confirmation number, or a reference to a previous availability quote).

url.description: URL that identifies the location associated with the record identified by the UniqueID.

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID elementSpace.

instance.description: The identification of a record as it exists at a point in time. An instance is used in update messages where the sender must assure the server that the update sent refers to the most recent modification level of the object being updated.

idContext.description: Used to identify the source of the identifier (e.g., IATA, ABTA).

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

idExtension.description: Additional identifying value assigned by the creating system.

currencyAmountType.description: A monetary value expressed with a currency code.

currencyCode.description: Provides a currency code to reflect the currency in which an amount may be expressed.

eventResourceNoteType.description: Contains the event resource's comment information.

noteId.description: Unique identifier for event resource comment. If it is missing, this indicate that it is a new comment. If only NoteID is provided then it is a delete operation

internal.description: Indicates if the comment is internal use only.

creatorId.description: ID of creator. The creator could be a software system identifier or an identifier of an employee resposible for the creation.

lastModifierId.description: Identifies the last software system or person to modify a record.

purgeDate.description: Date an item will be purged from a database (e.g., from a live database to an archive).

eventProcessInstructionsType.description: Instructions to control how the event is created.

overrideCapacity.description: Flag to indicate if configured function space capacity can be overriden.

overbook.description: Flag to indicate if the function space can be booked when it is occupied by another event.

shareable.description: Flag to indicate if the function space can be booked as shareable with another event.

overrideMaxgroups.description: Flag to indicate if maximum group configured in function space can be overriden.

waitList.description: Flag to indicate if the event can be waitlisted when function space is not available.

warnFunctionSpace.description: Flag to return a warning when the functionspace is being used by other catering event.

convertToSubEvent.description: Flag to indicate that the Event is being converted from Regular Event as a Sub Event linking to a Master Event.

convertToRegularEvent.description: Flag to indicate that the Event is being converted from Sub Event as a Regular Event.

quickEvent.description: Flag to indicate that both Block and Event would be created as part of the Quick Event process.

blockDetails.description: Detailed Block information for this block.

blockOwners.description: Criteria to assign the owners of a business block.

catering.description: Details of catering Information for the Block.

blockProfiles.description: A collection of all the profiles associated to this block. Please comment that during a change operation this performs a full overlay if the attribute FullOverlay is set to true. In a full overlay, all the profiles that should be associated to the block should be provided during a change operation. Any profiles not provided will be detached from this block. By default the full overlay is considered false if this tag is left blank. If values are provided for profiles, only the full overlay functionality is provided at this time.

blockProfile.description: The list of profiles associated with the block.

fullOverlay.description: Indicates whether to perform a full overlay for the profiles. Currently only the Fulloverlay functionality is provided.

inventoryItems.description: A collection of inventory items attached to a block.

blockStatistics.description: Indicates the functionSpaceDetails and revenue statistics of the block.

comments.description: List of notes for the Block.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

blockIndicators.description: Indicators of additional information attached to the block

statistics.description: Statistics summary information including Rooms Sold, Room Revenue, Food and Beverage Revenue, Average Room Rate,etc.

blockSecurity.description: Block security information used for an external system. Only available if configured in OPERA Cloud.

sellMessages.description: List of sell messages for the Block.

attachments.description: List of attachments for the Block.

washSchedules.description: List of wash schedules for the Block.

restrictions.description: List of restrictions for the Block.

markAsRecentlyAccessed.description: Mark this block as recently accessed.

creatorId.description: ID of creator. The creator could be a software system identifier or an identifier of an employee resposible for the creation.

lastModifierId.description: Identifies the last software system or person to modify a record.

externalReferencesType.description: This type contains unique information of external reference.

externalReferenceType.description: This type contains unique information of external reference.

blockDates.description: The Time Span(Arrival, Departure) which covers the Block Span.

shoulderDates.description: The Shoulder Dates (Arrival, Departure) which covers the Block Shoulder Span.

reservationType.description: Reservation Type info of the block.

marketCode.description: Market code info of the block.

sourceOfSale.description: Point of Sale of block. Identifies the entity/channel who made the block reservation.

bookingType.description: Business Block Type field on the Business Block

conversionCode.description: Indicates the likelihood description of the block moving to the next active block status.

conversionCodeDescription.description: Indicates the likelihood of the block moving to the next active block status.

rateProtectionDetails.description: Indicates the Rate Protection details for the block.

rankingCode.description: Indicates the ranking of the block.

rankingCodeDescription.description: Indicates the ranking description of the block.

currencyCode.description: Currency Code attached to the business block.

hotelName.description: A text field used to communicate the proper name of the hotel.

primaryProfiles.description: Primary account and contact for the block.

image.description: The primary profile image. If primary contact exists, Contact Image, otherwise primary Account Image

cateringOnlyBlock.description: Indicates if this is a catering only block.

flexibleDates.description: Indicates if alternate dates are allowed for the booking.

externalLocked.description: Indicates if the block is locked by an external system.

timeSpanType.description: Allows for a choice in description of the amount of time spanned by this type. EndDate specifies a specific date, while Duration provides a measure of time to add to the StartDate to yield eventEndDate date.

bookingStatusDetailType.description: Booking Status details of the business block.

bookingStatus.description: Booking Status of the business block.

deductInventory.description: Indicates if blocked rooms are deducted from inventory.

cateringDeductInventory.description: Indicates if catering event's spaces are deducted from inventory

returnToInventory.description: Indicates if blocked rooms will be returned to availability or not.

statusType.description: Indicates status type Inquiry, Actual, Cancel, etc.

catStatusType.description: Indicates status type Inquiry, Actual, Cancel, etc.

blockStatusTypeType.description: Simple type for specifying the block status type.

blockSourceOfSaleType.description: Point of Sale of Block. Identifies the entity/channel who made the block reservation.

sourceCode.description: Identifies how this block came into the property.

criteria.description: Indicates the type of rate protection. 'All' means all dates are rate protected. 'None' specifies no rate protection. 'Selected' specifies few dates are rate protected.

protectedDates.description: Specifies all the Rate protected dates in the selected range.

rateProtectionType.description: Simple type for specifying the block protection type.

criteria.description: Indicates the type of Non-Compete. 'All' means all dates are Non-Compete. 'None' specifies Non-Compete is disabled. 'Selected' specifies few dates are Non-Compete.

protectedDates.description: Specifies all the Non-Compete dates in the selected date range.

blockClassificationType.description: Simple type for block instructions to be used in requests for fetching blocks. Valid status values are MASTER_BLOCK, MASTER_TOUR, FIT_MASTER, MASTER_ALLOCATION, MASTER_ITINERARY, LEAD_MASTER, REGULAR_BOOKING, SUB_BLOCK, SUB_TOUR, FIT_CONTRACT, SUB_ALLOCATION, SUB_ITINERARY, LEAD.

blockOwnerType.description: Generic type for information about an owner.

hotel.description: Hotel to which the owner belongs to.

userName.description: Unique application user name of the owner.

ownerCode.description: Unique Code to identify the owner.

name.description: Provides name information of the owner.

department.description: Department to which the owner belongs to.

phone.description: Information on the telephone number of the owner.

relationship.description: Relationship of the owner within the profile or block.

primary.description: When true, this is a primary owner.

ownership.description: Specifies the business block ownership type.

profileId.description: An identifier used to uniquely reference an object in a system (e.g. an airline reservation reference, customer profile reference, booking confirmation number, or a reference to a previous availability quote).

url.description: URL that identifies the location associated with the record identified by the UniqueID.

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID elementSpace.

instance.description: The identification of a record as it exists at a point in time. An instance is used in update messages where the sender must assure the server that the update sent refers to the most recent modification level of the object being updated.

idContext.description: Used to identify the source of the identifier (e.g., IATA, ABTA).

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

idExtension.description: Additional identifying value assigned by the creating system.

personNameType.description: This provides name information for a person.

namePrefix.description: Salutation of honorific (e.g. Mr., Mrs., Ms., Miss, Dr.)

givenName.description: Given name, first name or names.

middleName.description: The middle name of the person name.

surname.description: Family name, last name. May also be used for full name if the sending system does not have the ability to separate a full name into its parts, e.g. the surname elementSpace may be used to pass the full name.

nameSuffix.description: Hold various name suffixes and letters (e.g. Jr., Sr., III, Ret., Esq.)

nameTitleSuffix.description: Title Suffix. Must be populated if ADVANCED_TITLE is on.

nameType.description: Type of name of the individual, such as former, nickname, alternate or alias name.

personNameTypeType.description: Person's name in an external system.

emailInfoType.description: Information on an email for the customer.

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID elementSpace.

emailType.description: Information on an email for the customer.

type.description: Defines the purpose of the e-mail address (e.g. personal, business, listserve).

telephoneInfoType.description: Information on a telephone number for the customer.

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID elementSpace.

telephoneType.description: Information on a telephone number for the customer.

phoneTechType.description: Indicates type of technology associated with this telephone number, such as Voice, Data, Fax, Pager, Mobile, TTY, etc.

phoneUseType.description: Describes the type of telephone number, in the context of its general use (e.g. Home, Business, Emergency Contact, Travel Arranger, Day, Evening).

phoneNumber.description: Telephone number assigned to a single location.

blockOwnershipType.description: Specifies the type of the owner associated with the business block(Block/Rooms/Catering).

blockProfilesType.description: A collection of Profile objects or Unique IDs of Profiles.

profileIdList.description: Unique identifiers for the Profile for both internal and external systems. In case of Travel Agent the IATA code and in case of Company can be any form of identifier as id.

profile.description: Provides detailed information regarding either a company or a customer profile.

primary.description: Is this profile attached to block is primary?

blockProfileType.description: Determines the type of the block profile.

uniqueIDListType.description: Unique Id that references an object uniquely in the system.

profileType.description: Type provides the detailed information about the profile and its children.

customer.description: Detailed customer information for this profile.

company.description: Detailed company information for this profile.

addressInfo.description: Collection of Detailed information on an address for the customer.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

ownerCode.description: Owner Code associated to the profile.

telephoneInfo.description: Collection of Detailed information on telephone/fax for the customer.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

emails.description: List of email address for the customer.

commentInfo.description: Collection of Detailed information on comments for the customer.

relationships.description: Contains a collection of profiles that have a relationship with this profile.

relationship.description: A collection of the profiles that have a relationship with this profile.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

relationshipsSummary.description: Contains a collection of profiles that have a relationship with this profile.

relationship.description: A collection of the profiles summary that have a relationship with this profile.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

stayReservationInfoList.description: Collection of Detailed information on history and future reservations associated with the profile.

profileType.description: Type of profile such as Guest, Agent, Company, Group, Source, Employee, Hotel, Vendor or Contact.

registeredProperty.description: Hotel which this profile is registered with. This attribute is not used for configuration.

requestForHotel.description: Hotel which this profile is to be registered. This attribute is only used during creation of profile.

customerType.description: Contains basic data on the customer's identity, location, relationships, finances, memberships, etc.

personName.description: Detailed name information for the customer.

currencyCode.description: The code specifying a monetary unit. Use ISO 4217, three alpha code.

currencySymbol.description: The symbol for the currency, e.g, for currencyCode USD the symbol is $.

decimalPlaces.description: Indicates the number of decimal places for a particular currency. This is equivalent to the ISO 4217 standard "minor unit". Typically used when the amount provided includes the minor unit of currency without a decimal point (e.g., USD 8500 needs DecimalPlaces="2" to represent $85).

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID elementSpace.

isValidated.description: Indicator to define if the Address is validated by the Address Validation System.

addressLine.description: When the address is unformatted (FormattedInd="false") these lines will contain free form address details. When the address is formatted and street number and street name must be sent independently, the street number will be sent using StreetNmbr, and the street name will be sent in the first AddressLine occurrence.

cityName.description: City (e.g., Dublin), town, or postal station (i.e., a postal service territory, often used in a military address).

cityExtension.description: Post Office City Extension Code number. City Extension mainly used for UK addresses.

county.description: County or District Name (e.g., Fairfax). This is read only.

type.description: Defines the type of address (e.g. home, business, other).

countryNameType.description: Code for a country or a nationality.

value.description: Used for Character Strings, length 0 to 200.

code.description: Code for a country or a nationality.

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID elementSpace.

uRLType.description: Web site address, in IETF(The Internet Engineering Task Force) specified format.

type.description: Defines the purpose of the URL address, such as personal, business, public, etc.

primaryInd.description: When true, indicates a primary information.

comment.description: Comment details for the comment. It will be empty in case of delete comment.

creatorId.description: ID of creator. The creator could be a software system identifier or an identifier of an employee resposible for the creation.

lastModifierId.description: Identifies the last software system or person to modify a record.

purgeDate.description: Date an item will be purged from a database (e.g., from a live database to an archive).

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID elementSpace.

commentType.description: An indication of a new paragraph for a sub-section of a formatted text message.

notificationLocation.description: Notification Location associated with the Note.

type.description: Specifies type of the comment.

internal.description: When true, the comment may not be shown to the consumer. When false, the comment may be shown to the consumer.

confidential.description: When true, the comment may be confidential.

overrideInternal.description: When true, the comment internal could be modified.

protectDescription.description: When true, the comment title will be populated from the comment type description and couldn't be modified.

hotelId.description: If specified comment belongs to the Hotel, otherwise it is a global comment.

actionType.description: Specifies type of action described in the comments.

actionDate.description: Indicates at which date an action described in the comment must be taken.

creatorId.description: ID of creator. The creator could be a software system identifier or an identifier of an employee resposible for the creation.

lastModifierId.description: Identifies the last software system or person to modify a record.

purgeDate.description: Date an item will be purged from a database (e.g., from a live database to an archive).

formattedTextTextType.description: Provides text and indicates whether it is formatted or not.

relationshipInfoType.description: Relationship Type contains information about the associations between and among individuals, companies, travel agents, groups, sources, and contact profiles.

changeRelationship.description: Information about the changes in relationship for the profile

relationshipProfile.description: Refer to Relationship Profile type document.

masterAccountInfo.description: Refer to Master Profile type document.

relation.description: Indicates the type of relationship the current profile(Source Profile) has with the related profile(Target Profile).

relationDescription.description: Displays the description of relationship the current profile(Source Profile) has with the related profile(Target Profile).

targetRelation.description: Displays the type of relationship the Related profile(Target Profile) has with the current profile(Source Profile).

targetRelationDescription.description: Displays the description of the target relation(Target Profile).

changeRelationsType.description: Detailed information regarding the changes made to relationships for the profile.

address.description: Information on address details for the customer/company

email.description: Information on email address for the customer/company

uRLs.description: Information on web url/address for the customer/company

profileIdList.description: Original profile details for which the relationships was created

changeProfileIdList.description: Updated/changed profile details for the relationships created

primary.description: Indicates if this relationship is the primary relationship.

profileType.description: Type of profile such as Guest, Agent, Company, Group, Source, Employee, Hotel, Vendor or Contact.

ownerType.description: Generic type for information about an owner.

hotel.description: Hotel to which the owner belongs to.

userName.description: Unique application user name of the owner.

ownerCode.description: Unique Code to identify the owner.

name.description: Provides name information of the owner.

department.description: Department to which the owner belongs to.

phone.description: Information on the telephone number of the owner.

relationship.description: Relationship of the owner within the profile or block.

primary.description: When true, this is a primary owner.

profileTypeType.description: The types of Profile handled by the web service.

masterAccountId.description: Unique ID of the Master account.

relationshipInfoSummaryType.description: RelationshipInfoSummaryType contains information about the associations between and among individuals, companies, travel agents, groups, sources, and contact profiles.

relationshipProfile.description: Refer to Relationship Profile Summary type document.

masterAccountDetails.description: Refer to Master Profile type document.

sourceRelation.description: Indicates the type of relationship the current profile(Source Profile) has with the related profile(Target Profile).

address.description: Information on address details for the customer/company

ownerCode.description: Unique Code to identify the owner.

profileIdList.description: Original profile details for which the relationships was created

primary.description: Indicates if this relationship is the primary relationship.

primaryOwnerCode.description: When true, this is a primary owner.

profileType.description: Type of profile such as Guest, Agent, Company, Group, Source, Employee, Hotel, Vendor or Contact.

relationshipAddressType.description: Provides address information for a Relationship.

addressLine.description: When the address is unformatted (FormattedInd="false") these lines will contain free form address details. When the address is formatted and street number and street name must be sent independently, the street number will be sent using StreetNmbr, and the street name will be sent in the first AddressLine occurrence.

city.description: City (e.g., Dublin), town, or postal station (i.e., a postal service territory, often used in a military address).

reservationStayHistoryFutureInfoType.description: Information of History and Future Reservation details attached to Profiles.

historyList.description: Refer to History list type document.

futureList.description: Refer to Future list type document.

stayHistoryListType.description: A collection of reservation history details attached to Profiles.

reservationInfo.description: Additional reservation information attached to the profile . Eg : History reservation details

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

stayReservationInfoType.description: The Reservation class contains the current reservation being created or altered.

reservationIdList.description: Unique identifiers for the reservation for both internal and external systems

reservationStatus.description: Indicates the status of the reservation.

computedReservationStatus.description: Indicates the status of the reservation.

reservationIdList.description: Unique Id that references an object uniquely in the system.

stayInfoType.description: Details on the Room Stay including Guest Counts, Time Span of this Room Stay, pointers to Res Guests, guest Memberships, Comments and Special Requests pertaining to this particular Room Stay and finally financial information related to the Room Stay, including Guarantee, Deposit and Payment and Cancellation Penalties.

originalTimeSpan.description: The Original Time Span covers the Room Stay dates of the original reservation.

expectedTimes.description: The expected arrival, return and departure times of the guest.

adultCount.description: A collection of Guest Counts associated with Room Stay.

childCount.description: A collection of Child Counts associated with Room Stay.

componentRoomType.description: True indicates functionSpaceDetails type is a component type.

points.description: The Points contains the number of points used to book a particular functionSpaceDetails type.

rateSuppressed.description: Whether this rate should be suppressed from view

reservationBlock.description: Key information about the block for this reservation.

fixedRate.description: True if the rate is a fixed rate, otherwise false

totalAmount.description: The total amount charged for the Room Stay including additional occupant amounts and fees. If TaxInclusive is set to True, then taxes are included in the total amount.

guarantee.description: The guarantee information associated to the Room Stay. A maximum of 5 occurances are available for use depending on the context.

sourceCodeDescription.description: Description of the source of business.

roomTypeCharged.description: Room type code that was charged

depositPayments.description: A collection of deposit and/or payments for the Room Stay.

guestServiceStatus.description: Service Status of In House guest like DND or MUP

scheduledCheckoutTime.description: Indicates that this reservation is scheduled for automated check out.

roomNumberLocked.description: When true, indicates a functionSpaceDetails number cannot be changed. When false, indicates a functionSpaceDetails number may be changed.

pseudoRoom.description: True indicates as pseudo functionSpaceDetails type. This is usually used for a posting master reservation.

assignedByAI.description: Represents the functionSpaceDetails was assigned by AI Room Assignment.

upgradedByAI.description: Represents the functionSpaceDetails was assigned by AI Room Assignment.

resExpectedTimesType.description: Holds the Arrival and Departure Time Information

pointsType.description: The Redeem Points contains the number of points required to book a functionSpaceDetails type.

awardsType.description: Awards type for the award type rate code.

points.description: No of points required to book this Room Stay.

reservationBlockType.description: Key information about the block for a reservation.

blockIdList.description: Collection of unique block identifiers for the reservation.

blockName.description: The Name of the block that is attached to the reservation.

hotelId.description: This is the HotelCode of the Block.

resGuaranteeType.description: Validations type record returned after Validations are done.

promotionType.description: Type to specify a rate promotion. Usually attached to a reservation to indicate a specific promotion is applied to the reservation.

promotionCode.description: Promotion code associated with the rate plan.

promotionName.description: Promotion code Name associated with the rate plan.

couponCode.description: Promotion Coupon Code when promotion is setupCode to have a valid coupon code.

guestHousekeepingServiceRequestType.description: Possible values for the Guest Service Status.

profileIdList.description: Unique Id that references an object uniquely in the system.

pMS_ResStatusType.description: This reservation is in checked in status and the business date is past departure date. This could occur when ORS and PMS are in same environment.

stayFutureListType.description: A collection of reservation history details attached to Profiles.

reservationInfo.description: Additional reservation information attached to the profile . Eg : Future reservation details

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

blockProfileTypeType.description: Simple type for block profile types.

blockOwnersType.description: Contains a list of block owners.

lockBlockOwners.description: When this flag is true, the logged in user cannot modify the existing block owners for the current block.

lockRoomsOwners.description: When this flag is true, the logged in user cannot modify the existing functionSpaceDetails owners for the current block.

lockCateringOwners.description: When this flag is true, the logged in user cannot modify the existing catering owners for the current block.

cateringType.description: Contains catering related information for the block.

cateringStatus.description: Catering Status details of the block.

cateringNextStatusList.description: Catering Status details of the block.

eventAttendees.description: The catering attendees information for events associated with the block.

boardInfo.description: The name by which the group wishes to be identified in the hotel.

onSiteName.description: The name of the customer's in-house representative or contact on the day of the catering event.

contractNumber.description: Catering contract number for the block.

functionInfo.description: This provides more detail the type of function for which the event is held. For example, Trade Show, Meeting, or Annual Convention.

trackChanges.description: Indicates whether the catering change logging for the booking is active or not. Any change made to catering events and resources will be logged when this is true.

eventOrder.description: Indicates if the Banquet Event Orders have been distributed.

followUpDate.description: Date used by catering manager or coordinator to follow up on the event.

decisionDate.description: Date by which event group must make a decision on the booking.

pkgsTmplt.description: Indicates whether event packages or templates can be applied to the block.

resourceDiscountPercentage.description: Indicates the resource discount percentage to be applied to resource items associated with the catering event.

hasPackageEvents.description: Indicates if the block has any package events.

applyBoardInfoToAllEvents.description: Indicates whether BoardInfo changes can be applied to all events of the block.

overrideEventsProcessingWarnings.description: Indicates whether to ignore any warning during applying the changes to the events associated with the current block.

applyEventsGuaranteeToAllEvents.description: Indicates whether Guarantee changes can be applied to all events of the block.

applyEventAttendeesChangesToEvents.description: Indicates to which the events of the block can the attendees changes be applied.

resourceDiscountType.description: Attibute that indicates to which type of resource the discount should be applied to.

cateringNextStatusListType.description: Next catering status of the business block.

sequence.description: Number indicating the sequence of status change.

bookingStatus.description: Booking status of the business block.

modifyDateTime.description: Date and time of the status change.

noOfAttendees.description: The maximum number of attendees for Catering events associated with the block.

attendeesGuaranteed.description: This denotes that the number of Attendees are the minimum guaranteed by the customer.

distributed.description: Indicates if the Banquet Event Orders have been distributed.

distributedDate.description: This indicates which exchange rate date will be used for blocks when printing Banquet Event Orders. When the Distributed attribute is true this contains the date stamp of when the Distributed attribute was updated. When Distributed attribute is false, this is left blank. This date can also be taken into consideration as the 'Exchange Rate Date' when, for instance, converting catering revenue to base currency.

distributedDateTime.description: This indicates which exchange rate date will be used for blocks when printing Banquet Event Orders. When the Distributed attribute is true this contains the date/time stamp of when the Distributed attribute was updated. When Distributed attribute is false, this is left blank. This date can also be taken into consideration as the 'Exchange Rate Date' when, for instance, converting catering revenue to base currency.

serviceCharge.description: The service charge for the Catering Events that will be added to the business block.

taxAmount.description: The tax amount for the Catering Events that will be added to the business block.

itemDiscountPercentage.description: The discount percentage to be applied to resource items associated with catering events.

cancellationDetailsType.description: This type holds information regarding booking status change to Cancel/ Lost.

cancellationCode.description: Code and description for cancellation reason.

cancellationDate.description: Date on which block was canceled.

cancellationInfo.description: Cancellation information provided by the customer.

destination.description: Alternate destination where the business is being taken.

lostToProperty.description: Holds the name of the property or competitor brand business was lost to.

applyEventAttendeesChangesToEventsType.description: Non-Pkg Events on the same date.

resourceDiscountTypeType.description: Indicates the option to select resources that will be discounted with the Resource Discount Percentage.

blockInventoryItemsType.description: Inventory item attached to a block.

blockInventoryItemType.description: An identifier used to uniquely reference an object in a system (e.g. an airline reservation reference, customer profile reference, booking confirmation number, or a reference to a previous availability quote).

url.description: URL that identifies the location associated with the record identified by the UniqueID.

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID elementSpace.

instance.description: The identification of a record as it exists at a point in time. An instance is used in update messages where the sender must assure the server that the update sent refers to the most recent modification level of the object being updated.

idContext.description: Used to identify the source of the identifier (e.g., IATA, ABTA).

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

idExtension.description: Additional identifying value assigned by the creating system.

item.description: Specifies Items and its attributes. When used for data manipulation for Items setupCode on reservation, etc only code is considered. Other Attributes are for used to provide information during fetch operation.

blockDates.description: Begin and eventEndDate date and time of the items applicability.

source.description: If exists specifies whether the item is setupCode due to a Rate Plan, Package or a Block.

availabilityPeriod.description: Defines a Time period when the item is available.

blockDates.description: Date Range to get the inventories of the items.

itemHoldId.description: ID reference for the hold Item

itemPool.description: Indicates if it is an item pool. Not applicable for Item within the Item Pool.

sellSeparate.description: If true indicates that item is allowed to sell separately.

sellInReservation.description: If true indicates that item can be sold in reservation.

sellInEvent.description: If true indicates that item can be sold in event.

requiredForBooking.description: If true indicates that item is required for the reservation.

fixedCharge.description: If true indicates that item has fixed charge when it is attached to a reservation.

outsideStay.description: If true indicates that item could be held outside of the reservation stay days.

defaultDuration.description: Define the default duration in days when booking the item.

timeWindowType.description: Defines a Time period with eventStartDate time and an eventEndDate time.

startTime.description: Start Time of the Time window.

endTime.description: End Time of the Time window.

dateRangeType.description: Date Range with Start and End dates.

eventStartDate.description: The starting value of the date range.

eventEndDate.description: The ending value of the date range.

blockInventoryItemSourceType.description: Defines whether the item is setupCode due to a Rate Plan, Package or a Block.

ratePlanCode.description: Rate Plan Code, If populated specifies that the item is setupCode due to a Rate Plan.

packageCode.description: Package Code, If populated specifies that the item is setupCode due to a Package.

blockId.description: Block Unique ID, If populated specifies that the item is setupCode due to a Block.

revenueSummaryType.description: Summary information pertaining to revenue like Room, Food and Beverage, Catering, Other, Catering Other and Total Revenue.

statisticsSummaryType.description: Type of statistic for which summary information is populated.

sellMessageConfigsType.description: The SellMessageConfigsType is the list of sell messages, each comprising of all the sell message attributes and other details.

sellMessageConfigType.description: Only one of the following can hold a value: HotelCode, CROCode or ChainCode

blockId.description: Unique OPERA Block ID which is used to find a Block from OPERA. This ID is a primary identification of a Block in OPERA.

blockCode.description: Block Code to which the sell message is defined.

timespan.description: Begin and End date for the sell message.

hotelId.description: Hotel Code for which the sell message is defined.

croCode.description: CRO Code for which the sell message is defined.

chainCode.description: Chain Code for which the sell message is defined.

roomType.description: Room type for which the sell message is defined.

ratePlanCode.description: Rate Plan Code for which the sell message is defined.

languageCode.description: Language in which the sell message is defined.

stickyFlag.description: Sticky flag is used to define if the sell message should display on the block screen by default.

sellSequence.description: This number indicates the display order of the sell message.

usedInModule.description: This represents the moduleType where we want to display this SellMessage.

blockWashSchedulesType.description: Wash Schedule attached to the block, which allows to release inventory based on selected wash schedule type.

blockWashScheduleType.description: Allows to select type of wash schedule: by number of rooms or by percentage.

washDate.description: Date on which the block wash operation will be performed.

roomTypes.description: A single functionSpaceDetails type on which wash operation should be performed.

washByRooms.description: Wash by rooms contains the occupany details and sell values for a specific block wash schedule.

washByPercent.description: When using the Wash by % option, indicate a wash percentage that will be applied it to the whole block.

blockGridInvType.description: Indicates the inventory values ( occupancy or availability ) per person occupancy.

onePerson.description: Indicates the one person inventory value ( occupancy or availability ).

twoPerson.description: Indicates the two person inventory value ( occupancy or availability ).

threePerson.description: Indicates the three person inventory value ( occupancy or availability ).

fourPerson.description: Indicates the four person inventory value ( occupancy or availability ).

cutoffDate.description: Indicates the cutoff date.Date when inventory left in the block will be cut-off.

blockRestrictionsType.description: List of restrictions belonging to a block.

blockId.description: Unique OPERA Block ID which is used to find a Block from OPERA. This ID is a primary identification of a Block in OPERA.

hotelId.description: Hotel to which the block belongs to.

restrictionDate.description: Date for which the restriction applies.

roomType.description: Room Type selected for the block restriction.

blockRestrictionStatus.description: Indicates the type of restriction along with parameters for restriction, if any.

actualTimeSpan.description: Actual time span of the restriction.

timeSpanDaysOfWeekType.description: Container for Time span with days of week.

restrictionStatusType.description: The RestrictionStatusType is used to indicate the type of restriction applied. An enumerated restriction type is defined in the attribute group.

code.description: Identifies the type of restriction. I.E. Closed, ClosedForArrival, etc.

unit.description: Defines restriction in conjunction with Restriction Code. Value must be specified for Restriction Codes MinimumStayThrough, MaximumStayThrough, MinimumLengthOfStay, MaximumLengthOfStay, MinimumAdvanceBooking, MaximumAdvanceBooking.

lOS1.description: Indicates Length of Stay 1 is not available. Defines restriction in conjunction with Restriction Code LOSNotAvailable.

lOS2.description: Indicates Length of Stay 2 is not available. Defines restriction in conjunction with Restriction Code LOSNotAvailable.

lOS3.description: Indicates Length of Stay 3 is not available. Defines restriction in conjunction with Restriction Code LOSNotAvailable.

lOS4.description: Indicates Length of Stay 4 is not available. Defines restriction in conjunction with Restriction Code LOSNotAvailable.

lOS5.description: Indicates Length of Stay 5 is not available. Defines restriction in conjunction with Restriction Code LOSNotAvailable.

lOS6.description: Indicates Length of Stay 6 is not available. Defines restriction in conjunction with Restriction Code LOSNotAvailable.

lOS7.description: Indicates Length of Stay 7 or more is not available. Defines restriction in conjunction with Restriction Code LOSNotAvailable.

eventFunctionSpaceType.description: Pertain Information about the Function Space for events.

discountPercentage.description: Discount Percentage applied to Rent Amount.

minimumOccupancy.description: Minimum Occupancy for the SetupCode of Catring Event.

maximumOccupancy.description: Maximum Occupancy for the SetupCode of Catring Event.

shareable.description: Flag to indicate if the event functionSpaceDetails is shareable.

comboSpace.description: Flag to indicate if the function space is a combination functionSpaceDetails.

elementSpace.description: Flag to indicate if the function space is an elementSpace of a comboSpace function space.

noteId.description: Unique identifier for event comment. If it is missing, this indicate that it is a new comment. If only NotID is provided then it is a delete operation

internal.description: Indicates if comment are internal use only.

creatorId.description: ID of creator. The creator could be a software system identifier or an identifier of an employee resposible for the creation.

lastModifierId.description: Identifies the last software system or person to modify a record.

purgeDate.description: Date an item will be purged from a database (e.g., from a live database to an archive).

lightEventsDetailType.description: Pertain event few information about events.

eventRevenuesInformationType.description: Collection of revenue information about a catering event.

eventRevenueInformation.description: Revenue information about a catering event.

currencyCode.description: Currency code when base currency of the property is different than the catering currency.

excludeFromForecast.description: Flag to indicate if the event revenue should be excluded from the forecast.

useForecastRevenue.description: Flag to indicate whether to only use the forecasted values when reporting, regardless of whether resources are booked on an event.

eventLevelRevenueActualization.description: Flag that indicates if actual revenue can be manually edited.

totalCost.description: Total cost involved on this revenue.

flatForecastRevenue.description: Flag to indicate forecast revenue is a flat amount, therefore NOT per person.

custom.description: Flag indicating revenues are from a custom revenue type.

ignoreForecast.description: Flag indicating to ignore forecast figures.

packaged.description: Flag indicating if the revenues are generated by a catering package.

revenueTypeType.description: Base type provides information about Catering Revenue Types Configuration.

code.description: Code is used to identify a Catering Revenue Type/Code.

translatableDescription.description: Translatable Description of the Catering Revenue Types.

inactive.description: Indicates if the Revenue type Code is inactive.

revenueDetails.description: Collection of Revenue details assoicated to a Revenue Type (Additional Details)

translationTextType200.description: Contains Multiple translated texts and language codes.

defaultText.description: Default text with Character length from 0 to 200.

translations.description: List of translated text and language codes.

revenueTypeDetailsType.description: List of Revenue details assoicated to a Revenue Type (Additional Details)

revenueTypeDetailType.description: Details type provides information about Catering Revenue Type Details.

hotelId.description: Hotel Code is used to set associated revenue type details.

tags.name: EventManagement
tags.description: The Event APIs will allow you to retrieve, create, manage and delete events and related event functionality such as event resources, catering packages and even event waitlists.

externalDocs.description: Find out more about Oracle Hospitality
